info.title: JSON Server Report
info.description: Creates an asynchronous server report in JSON format according to user request.

method.name: get

parameter.name: $allowOrigin
parameter.description: The allow origin header value for the ServerReport response headers. If empty, calculate the inner allow origin of the framework (more secure). It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $withCredentials
parameter.description: The allow credentials header value for the ServerReport response headers. It is TRUE by default.

method.returndescription: The server report in json format.

method.name: addContent
method.description: Adds a content report to the report stack.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The body of the report content.

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The content key value. If set, the content will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The content's type. See class constants. It is CONTENT_JSON by default.

method.name: addAction
method.description: Adds an action report to the report stack.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The action type. This may vary according to the handler.

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The action key value. If set, the action will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).

method.name: getReport
method.description: Builds the entire report with the head and the body and returns the json string generated.

method.name: getReportContent
method.description: Creates a report content as an array inside the report.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The action type. This may vary according to the handler.
